title: Solr Logo
description: Attaching original Paintshop Pro file format of Solr logo.  Please commit to svn.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:
Thanks clay ... Gimp 2.2.13 recognizes it's a pint shop pro file, but can't open it because it's "Unsupported PSP file format version 5.0"

Any chance PSP can save to a more standard/non-proprietary format without loosing data? (ie: svg)

comments.author: Clay Webster
comments.content: Yeah, I wasn't too hopeful.  For the record, it's was with PSP 7.0+.  To get over the hump, I'll attach a few scaled up supersize images that should be easily scaled down for other needs.
